testcase.name: Dropdown suggestions are shown when mouse over-smartfilter

testcase.name: A pill is created when a sort option is clicked-smartfilter
Brackets pills are created when brackets are selected-smartfilter
Suggestions change when a pill is selected-smartfilter
Selecting an operator applies the operator to the pill-smartfilter
Selecting empty removes the pills value-smartfilter
Selecting list turns the pills into a list-smartfilter
Selecting range turns the pills into a range-smartfilter

failure.message: suggestions.spec.ts:234:3 Selecting range turns the pills into a range-smartfilter
